#labels Featured
=Issue Tracking=
To keep track of improvements, issues, bugs,... for this project we use the Google Code tools.

==Register an issue==
If you want to register a new bug, go to the [http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/entry Google Code Issue Entry page].

==View all issues==
For an overview of all open issues (improvements and bugs) go to the [http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues Google Code Issue Tracker].
